name: Blockbuster 3000
description:
A ninjarope physics inspired 2.5D game in a classic Synthwave setting.  Gain momentum, break all the boxes, avoid the pitfalls and proceed to the next level.

*** INSTRUCTIONS ***

Follow the prompts at the bottom for tips. Destroy all enemy boxes before proceeding to the right. Avoid white boxes. Hold in Mouse1 for extra power and play around with the physics! 

*** CONTROLS ***

This game solely uses mouse controller and does require some precision, therefore trackpads are discouraged.

*** DEVELOPMENT ***

I made this in a 5 day period after work - there's likely to be a few bugs and oddities here and there given how very little time was spent, sorry!

*** FEEDBACK ***

If you have any constructive feedback I'd love to hear it below - thanks for playing!

*** CREDITS ***

Developer: SineTwo

Engine: Unity

Asset: OpenFracture

Music: Alumo RFM - Skyline

SFX: freesounds.org [1] [2]
